name: Steak Meal
description: Who doesn't love steaks? A variety of steak items are available for home delivery. Good quality meat is served with vegetables. So hurry up and order now.

name: Spicy Shrimp Noodles
description: Shout out to all the spicy lovers out there. Our Kitchen brings you the spiciest garlic flavored shrimp noodles to meet your cravings for spicy food.

name: Burger and Fries
description: Tired of eating regular meals everyday? Try our fast food. We provide burger, fries and other fast food items too. These are finger licking good!

name: Caesar Salad
description: Are you dieting? Can't eat delicious foods? Don't worry we also provide healthy delicious salads. It's perfectly balanced with nutrition so you are gonna love it for sure.

name: Fried Rice
description: Rice is one of the most diverse dishes. It can be eaten with almost anything and can be prepared in a lot of different ways. Try ours, it's unique in it's own delicious way.

name: Sweet Pastry
description: Dessert Alert! Your meal can't be completed without some sweet treats. We can make any type of dessert you like, you can also specify the sweetness level to your liking.
